title: Gold Star families speak out on fall of Afghanistan: ‘Our hearts are broken’
content:
1. Gold Star families speak out on fall of Afghanistan: ‘Our hearts are broken’  Fox News
  2. A 27-year-old female mayor in Afghanistan says the Taliban 'will come for people like me and kill me'  Business Insider
  3. Afghan government collapses as Taliban enters Kabul l GMA  Good Morning America
  4. China looks forward to 'friendship' with Taliban but doesn’t recognize their rule — yet  Yahoo News
  5. Ben Wallace breaks down over Afghanistan in LBC interview  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
